description.value: You provide emotional and spiritual care. Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stupefied], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stunned] to the list of conditions you can reduce with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Treat Condition]. If the stunned condition has a duration instead of a value, you can't use Treat Condition to reduce it.
